item.title: Heal
item.description: INTRODUCTION I arrived at Heal a couple months after it was released. At the face of it, Heal is about a website that has a simple resume-building service. I never really figured out how the name “Heal” relates to the box or icon. While it was on the easier side of “Medium”, it’s tempting to do way too much recon. Everything you need to know from recon can be found by “spidering” the website using a web app proxy (I’ll be using ZAP in this one).
